name: tiddlywiki
tagline: A self contained wiki and personal knowledge base
description: TiddlyWiki is a unique self-contained wiki and personal knowledge base that runs in the browser as a single HTML file. It supports plugins, scripting, and nonlinear note-taking, and can be self-hosted or stored locally.

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Extend functionality with hundreds of community plugins for themes, features, and integrations

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Organize notes with tags and view tag hierarchies for flexible categorization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find content across all notes using full-text search with filters and advanced queries

features.title: Macros And Scripting
features.description: Automate tasks and create custom functionality using built-in macro language

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run from local file system, USB drive, or self-hosted server with no installation required
